Northern Guangdong covers the inland part of Guangdong and includes the prefectures of Yunfu, Zhaoqing, Qingyuan, Shaoguan, Heyuan and Meizhou. This region is less developed and less industrialised than the coastal regions of Guangdong.  Instead, you will find mountains, rainforests and ethnic minorities here.

value: content=Lake Scenic Area in Southern China is the largest artificial lake ( Xinfeng river reservoir ), storage capacity 13900000000 stere, because here the four seasons is green, everywhere is green and named lake. Water from the Guangzhou, Shenzhen in 200 kilometers, is called the" garden of Pearl River delta".
